result.markdown:
---
title: "Chart: Young offenders are more likely to re-offend than adults"
author: Matt Ashby
date: '2019-11-04'
slug: reoffending-rates
categories:
  - Crime and justice chart of the week
tags:
  - offending
  - reoffending
  - criminal justice
---














Most people convicted of a crime will not be convicted or cautioned for another offence within 12 months, although young offenders are more likely to offend again than adults. Most re-offending is by a small number of prolific offenders who frequently pass through the criminal justice system â€“ more than 60% of people released from short prison sentences will reoffend within a year.
